question: Which is the art type of {Art Work}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?typeLabel WHERE { ?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P2_has_type ?type . ?type rdfs:label ?typeLabel . Filter(REGEX(str(?label), "{Art Work}","i")).}

question: What was the material used in the {Art Work}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label  ?material WHERE {?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P67i_is_referred_to_by ?ref . ?ref rdf:value ?material. filter(STRENDS(str(?ref),"medium")). Filter(REGEX(str(?label), "{Art Work}","i")).}

question: Which gave {Art Work} to the museum?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?value WHERE { ?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P67i_is_referred_to_by ?ref . ?ref rdf:value ?value. FILTER(REGEX(STR(?value) , "Gift of" ) || REGEX(STR(?value), "Bequest of" ))  Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}

question: Who is the creator of {Art Work}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?value WHERE {?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P108i_was_produced_by ?prod . ?prod cidoc:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor rdfs:label ?value  Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}

question: Which is the birth place of {Artist}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT distinct ?actor ?label ?placeLabel WHERE { ?actor rdfs:label ?label . ?actor cidoc:P92i_was_brought_into_existence_by ?existence . ?existence cidoc:P7_took_place_at ?place . ?place rdfs:label ?placeLabel .  Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Artist}","i"))}

question: When the production of {Art Work} started?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?date WHERE {?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P108i_was_produced_by ?prod .?prod cidoc:P4_has_time-span ?tsp .?tsp cidoc:P82a_begin_of_the_begin ?date  Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}

question: When the production of {Art Work} ended?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?endDate WHERE { ?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P108i_was_produced_by ?prod . ?prod cidoc:P4_has_time-span ?tsp . ?tsp cidoc:P82b_end_of_the_end ?endDate Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}

question: Which is the nationality of the creator of {Art Work}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>  PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?nationality WHERE { ?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P108i_was_produced_by ?prod . ?prod cidoc:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor cidoc:P107i_is_current_or_former_member_of ?country . ?country rdfs:label ?nationality. Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}

question: Which is the birth place of the creator of {Art Work}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?place WHERE { ?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P108i_was_produced_by ?prod . ?prod cidoc:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor cidoc:P92i_was_brought_into_existence_by ?existence . ?existence cidoc:P7_took_place_at ?placeLabel . ?placeLabel rdfs:label ?place. Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}

question: Which year died the creator of {Art Work}?
sparql: PREFIX cidoc: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?artwork ?label ?deathYear WHERE { ?artwork rdfs:label ?label . ?artwork cidoc:P108i_was_produced_by ?prod . ?prod cidoc:P14_carried_out_by ?actor . ?actor cidoc:P93i_was_taken_out_of_existence_by ?out . ?out cidoc:P4_has_time-span ?ts . ?ts rdfs:label ?deathYear. Filter(REGEX(?label, "{Art Work}","i"))}
